Constructors

EdgeColorAnimation(Edge, Color, Color, double, Func<double, double>?, Action<Edge, Color>?, Action?)

Creates a new edge color animation.

public EdgeColorAnimation(Edge edge, Color startColor, Color endColor, double duration = 0.3, Func<double, double>? easing = null, Action<Edge, Color>? onUpdate = null, Action? onComplete = null)

Parameters

edge Edge

The edge to animate.

startColor Color

Starting color.

endColor Color

Ending color.

duration double

Animation duration in seconds.

easing Func<double, double>

Easing function (defaults to EaseOutCubic).

onUpdate Action<Edge, Color>

Callback called each frame with the edge and current color.

onComplete Action

Callback when animation completes.
